primary.description: Specifies the primary font for the widget, used for titles and emphasis.

secondary.description: Specifies the secondary font for the widget, used for detail items.

hyperlink.description: Text color for hyperlinks (view-website, get-directions, store-hours)

available.description: Text color for available stock (typically a shade of green)

unavailable.description: Text color for unavailable stock (typically a shade of gray)

none.description: Specifies the absence of a color

stack.description: Fonts to be 'stacked' after the primary font-family

weight.description: Used primarily to build the Google Font API call.

align.description: Refers to the spacing between each row and it's parent container.

gap.description: The gap between the online seller items.

align.description: Refers to the spacing between the map and it's parent container.
Refers to the spacing between each row and it's parent container.

gap.description: The gap between the online seller items.

gradientBackground.description: Pass a properly formatted linear-gradient parameter value to render a linear-gradient background - https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/linear-gradient
